abilities.name: Reactive Healing
abilities.effect: Whenever you attach a React Energy card from your hand to Tangela, remove all damage counters from Tangela.

attacks.name: Entangling Vines
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is a Basic Pokémon, that Pokémon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Gentle Wrap
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.
